meanings.definition: An enzyme produced in the stomach that helps digest proteins.
meanings.sent1: The pepsin in your stomach breaks down the chicken you ate.
meanings.sent2: Doctors sometimes use pepsin to help with digestion issues.
meanings.sent3: The pepsin in the stomach was having a party with the proteins.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like pepsin breaking down barriers.
meanings.sent5: The pepsin worked tirelessly to break apart the tough proteins.

meanings.definition: A substance containing pepsin, used to aid digestion.
meanings.sent1: She took a tablet of pepsin after a heavy meal.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist recommended pepsin to help with his digestion.
meanings.sent3: The pepsin supplement made the food disappear like magic.
meanings.sent4: His words were like pepsin, cutting through the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The pepsin supplement quickly dissolved in water, ready to aid digestion.
